projects.name: restViz-package
projects.description: A zero-config Express middleware for generating interactive API docs and live testing UI – all from your routes.
projects.about: The RestViz NPM package is a plug-and-play middleware for Express (v4 & v5) that auto-generates interactive API documentation. With support for custom metadata like descriptions, request bodies, and example responses, RestViz turns your backend into a live-testing environment. No need for Swagger or Postman — just drop it in your app, and you're good to go. It’s fast, framework-agnostic, and focused on developer ergonomics.

projects.name: manaileng
projects.description: A soccer site for Manaileng FC soccer club which features Team news and match updates, Fixtures and results, Player profiles, Club history and mission, Contact info and location
projects.about:
Manaileng Football Club was established in 2006 by a group of passionate football enthusiasts from Zebediela, Limpopo. What started as a community initiative has grown into one of the most respected football clubs in the region. 
 Our journey has been marked by perseverance, growth, and an unwavering commitment to developing local talent. Through the years, we've built a strong foundation based on discipline, teamwork, and community involvement. 
Today, Manaileng FC competes at the highest levels of regional football, with aspirations to reach the Premier Soccer League. We continue to invest in youth development, infrastructure, and coaching excellence to achieve our goals.

projects.name: MediNow
projects.description: A university-led health tech project offering digital access to medical information and emergency services for University students on and off campus.
projects.about: Medi Now your reliable companion in times of need! primarily build for students, this app is designed with your safety in mind, providing a range of features to ensure swift and effective emergency assistance. Currently the app is not uploaded on google play or any other app store, you can clone and build app or indulge your eyes on the screenshots uploaded. Medi-now uses morden technologies to better address problems in hand.

projects.name: restViz-site
projects.description: A sleek, interactive API documentation and testing sandbox built for modern Express apps—say goodbye to Postman and Swagger.
projects.about: RestViz started as a lightweight API documentation middleware for Express, but quickly evolved into a full-featured live API testing sandbox. With zero setup, developers can now test routes directly from the browser. It supports interactive request sending, customizable metadata (descriptions, params, responses), and clean UI out of the box. Designed for speed, simplicity, and dev joy.

services.name: Design
services.description: Design isn't just what a product looks like and feels like on the outside. Design encompasses the internal functionality of a product as well as the overall user experience. I strive to design interfaces and experiences that people can enjoy on all digital mediums.

services.name: Development
services.description: With a solid grounding in computer science, my enthusiasm lies in both web design and development, with a budding interest in mobile app development. As I progress in my software developement journey, my goal is to craft code that is not only clean and readable but also serves as a foundation for others, enabling the creation of aesthetically pleasing software.

services.name: Involvement
services.description: Engagement in the tech community fuels my passion for growth and learning. Through participation in hackathons, coding bootcapms, and online forums, I immerse myself in the latest trends and technologies, gaining invaluable insights in the ever evovling landscape of computer science and honing my skills.

faqs.question: Do you provide website maintenance after delivery?
faqs.answer: While maintenance is not included in the packages, I can offer ongoing support as an additional service.

faqs.question: How long will it take to build my project?
faqs.answer: Timeline depends on project size and requirements. A simple site may take a few days, while a custom app can take weeks.

faqs.question: Are you able to redesign my existing website?
faqs.answer: Yes! I can either improve your current site or rebuild it from scratch based on your goals.

faqs.question: Can you work with my designer or team?
faqs.answer: Yes! I’ve worked solo and with teams I’m happy to collaborate using Figma, Trello, GitHub, or whatever you use.

pricing.description: A clean, responsive one-page site ideal for product launches, portfolios, or marketing campaigns. Includes animations, contact form, and basic SEO.
A modern frontend-only web application with dynamic UI, state management, and API integrations.
Multi-page website for small to medium businesses. Includes essential pages, responsive layout, SEO setup, and contact integration.
